name: Sweet Dreams of Destruction
description:
This is a 2D Physics Platformer with Fluid and Rope Simulation! 

This project is made using a in house Game Engine (Kross Game Engine) made using C++ and OpenGL 4.6 (Make sure you have graphics drivers of 4.6 and above)

This was also a school project that we have been working on for quite awhile now and would love to get everyone's thoughts on our work!
